bibl.title: Ostraka varia. Tax Receipts and Legal Documents on Demotic, Greek, and Greek-Demotic Ostraka, chiefly of the Early Ptolemaic Period, from Various Collections. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVI.)
bibl.note: O. Varia 1-62. - Tax Receipts from Elephantine (1-31A), from Hermonthis (32-38), of unknown provenance (39-41), from Thebes (42-52). - Receipt for the price of a building plot (53). - Three ostraka from Theban Tomb 373 (54-56). - Decisory temple oath from Jême (57). - Some early Roman tax receipts (58-62).
